name: Preschool
description: Every parent wants their child enrolled in the best preschool. That is what we strive for – to give them the peace of mind knowing that their children are in a safe, nurturing, and dynamic childcare facility surrounded with loving and dedicated staff members. We offer topnotch education programs that suit the developmental stages of our young learners. Programs offered at 1ST PLACE 2 START - Preschool - Field Trips - Play Therapy Group - Daily Nutrition

howToGetIt: Our open enrollment includes the following process: - Stop by, we will assist you in completing the enrollment forms. - Bring your child’s yellow state of California immunization record. - Bring one current photo of your child. - Provide a health report signed by a physician, including TB results. - Visit the classroom with your child. Fill out Online ENROLLMENT Form
address: 1252 Sunnydale Avenue San Francisco, California 94134, San Francisco, CA, 94134
